title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Mixing business and pleasure may not be as simple as it sounds today. You might endeavor to align your perceptions of fun with those in your immediate environment, only to discover they are singularly interested in their work. Or, perhaps a colleague or supervisor believes that youre focused more on revelry than your responsibilities now. Heed the cosmic warning as needed and manage the risk of overindulgence while the voracious Leo Moon squares vivacious Venus in your saucy sign. Moderation saves the day. Confucius wrote, To go beyond is as wrong as to fall short. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
